name: TheRunningGame
description:
Game should be played in Fullscreen mode!

The Running Game 
A endless runner game designed as a One Button Game. The objective is to survive for as long as possible by jumping over incoming projectiles. 

Free assets from Unity Asset Store has been used in this game.

Made by Tobias as the end project for:
Visual Design and Programming
Bleking Institute of Technology
Summer 2021
